question: What is the name of the report that the authors listed in the text contributed to, and what is its title?
answer: The report is the IPCC Special Report on the Ocean and Cryosphere in a Changing Climate, and its title is not explicitly stated in the text, but it is mentioned as [H.-O. Pörtner, D.C. Roberts, V. Masson-Delmotte, P. Zhai, M. Tignor, E. Poloczanska, K. Mintenbeck, A. Alegría, M. Nicolai, A. Okem, J. Petzold, B. Rama, N.M. Weyer (eds.)].
